body_html:
If you encounter the issue again, run the CUDA initialization under strace:

strace python -c "import torch; torch.cuda.FloatTensor(1)"

or to log to a file

strace python -c "import torch; torch.cuda.FloatTensor(1)" 2>&1 | tee strace.log
body_text:
If you encounter the issue again, run the CUDA initialization under strace:
strace python -c "import torch; torch.cuda.FloatTensor(1)"

or to log to a file
strace python -c "import torch; torch.cuda.FloatTensor(1)" 2>&1 | tee strace.log
body:
If you encounter the issue again, run the CUDA initialization under strace:

```
strace python -c "import torch; torch.cuda.FloatTensor(1)"
```

or to log to a file

```
strace python -c "import torch; torch.cuda.FloatTensor(1)" 2>&1 | tee strace.log
```
